jff.gui
Class JFFToolBarImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JToolBar
                  jff.gui.JFFToolBarImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants, JFFToolBar
public class JFFToolBarImpl
extends javax.swing.JToolBar
implements JFFToolBar

The implementation of the tool bar of the application.
It consists of these buttons:

  • Add
  • DeleteFiles
  • PlayFile
  • DeleteTask
  • Play
  • DeleteAllTasks
  • PauseAllTasks
  • ResumePlay

Version:
%I%
Author:
Francesco Fornasini
See Also:
Serialized Form
